description_md: Named for a chic taste and wanderers everywhere, the soft and neatly shaped Meraki in Carmim color, is crafted in premium quality oxford fabric with leather detailing for a rich look. Updated with zip-top closure and two separate zipped compartments both inside and out, the compact minimalist side bag can also be used as a cross body. Adorned with a eastern floral pattern inside, this portable new arrival comes with antiqued hardware and adjustable leather straps that speaks both smart and chic.
